sub_topic: Calculating the circumference of a circle.
message_1: A circular trampoline has a diameter of 10 feet. Calculate its circumference.
message_2:
To calculate the circumference of a circle, we use the formula:

Circumference = Diameter × π

The diameter of the trampoline is 10 feet, and the value of π (pi) is approximately 3.14159.

Circumference = 10 × 3.14159 ≈ 31.4159 feet

So, the circumference of the circular trampoline is approximately 31.42 feet.
